name: SlickSlack
description:
The SlickSlack theme for Slack (a chat application); works best with "Clean" message formatting in your personal Slack preferences. This theme by JasWSInc @ WebSharks, Inc.

SlickSlack is all about improving the separation between bot messages & other personal chat messages from your teammates. With SlickSlack it is much easier to find messages from collaborators in a Slack channel; even when there is a lot of other noise.

user.name: Jason Caldwell
user.about: {"me": "Developer at WebSharksâ„¢, avid GitHubber, and now an Alaskan!"}

additional_info: NOTE: The design of this theme is quite simple, so it's easy to customize further if you like. There are only a few lines of CSS that enhance the Slack interface. Add additional styles of your own, or tweak the existing styles to your liking.
